response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,200,000 to you, and my proposal aims to strike a balance between our interests while maximizing the value for you. I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special price of $1,150,000. This offer is exclusive and tailored to ensure that you receive exceptional value while allowing me to secure a profit that reflects the true worth of the product. I believe this price is fair and competitive, providing you with a significant advantage over other potential buyers. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of completing this transaction. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 1150000}
